```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(here)

library(ggcoverage)
library(Rsamtools)
library(ggbio)

synapser::synLogin()

theme_set(theme_minimal(base_family = "Helvetica"))

syn <- synDownloader("~/data", .cache = TRUE)
```

```{r}
inputs <- c(
  sample_meta = "syn53061904",
  size_factors = "syn53061911"
)

input_files <- map(
  inputs, syn
)

sample_meta <- read_csv(input_files[["sample_meta"]])
size_factors <- read_csv(input_files[["size_factors"]])
```

```{r}

ensembl_gtf <- rtracklayer::import(
  here("index", "Homo_sapiens.GRCh38.110.gtf.gz")
)

```


```{r}
samples_sendai <- sample_meta %>%
  filter(
    (study_name == "Buckberry Nature 2023" &
      treatment %in% c("NtP", "Na√Øve", "Primed", "Control ESC", "TNT")) |
      source_name == "5iLAF SSEA4- subpopulation UCLA1 hESCs"
  )

```

```{r}
sendai_region <- "pSeV-idSOX2-Pmut:1150-19976"

sendai_plot_data <- samples_sendai %>%
  mutate(
    # Label Pastor samples correctly
    treatment = replace_na(treatment, "Control ESC"),
    bam_name = paste0(sample_accession, "_Aligned.out_sorted"),
    bam_path = file.path("star", paste0(bam_name, ".bam")),
    bam_obj = map(
      bam_path, BamFile
    ),
    n_mapped = map_int(
      bam_obj,
      \(x) idxstatsBam(x)$mapped %>%
        sum()
    )
  ) %>%
  power_left_join(
    size_factors,
    by = "sample_accession",
    check = check_specs(
      unmatched_keys_left = "warn",
      duplicate_keys_right = "warn"
    )
  )
all(file.exists(sendai_plot_data$bam_path))

sendai_bam_meta <- sendai_plot_data %>%
  transmute(
    sample_accession,
    SampleName = bam_name,
    Type = sample_accession,
    Group = treatment
  )

sendai_bam_tracks <- LoadTrackFile(
  sendai_plot_data$bam_path,
  format = "bam",
  region = sendai_region,
  meta.info = sendai_bam_meta,
  norm.method = "None",
  extend = 0,
  bin.size = 500,
  # bc.extra.para = "--effectiveGenomeSize 2913022398"
) %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  left_join(
    sendai_plot_data %>%
      select(where(negate(is.list))),
    by = c("sample_accession")
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    score_raw = score,
    score = 1e6 * score / (size_factor * mean(n_mapped))
  )

sendai_gene_df <- tribble(
  ~symbol, ~start, ~end,
  "N gene", 1202, 2884,
  "P gene", 2888, 4570,
  "M gene", 4606, 5652,
  "F gene", 5803, 7500,
  "HN gene", 7630, 9353,
  "L gene", 9493, 16219
) %>%
  mutate(
    seqname = "pSeV-idSOX2-Pmut",
    strand = "+",
    type = "gene",
    gene_name = symbol,
    gene_type = "protein_coding"
  )

sendai_gene_granges <- GenomicRanges::makeGRangesFromDataFrame(
  sendai_gene_df,
  keep.extra.columns = TRUE
)

sendai_gene_glist <- GenomicRanges::makeGRangesListFromDataFrame(
  mutate(
    sendai_gene_df,
    type = "exon"
  ),
  keep.extra.columns = TRUE,
  split.field = "gene_name"
)
```

```{r}
sendai_gene_plot <- ggplot() +
  geom_alignment(
    sendai_gene_glist,
    # aes(
    #   y = ypos
    # ),
    range.geom = "arrow",
    cds.rect.h = 0.1
  )

sendai_bam_coverage_long <- sendai_bam_tracks %>%
  pivot_longer(c(start, end), names_to = "pos_type", values_to = "pos") %>%
  mutate(
    treatment_grouped = case_when(
      treatment == "Control ESC" ~ paste("Control ESC", study_name),
      TRUE ~ treatment
    )
  ) %>%
  group_by(treatment_grouped) %>%
  mutate(
    rep = factor(
      sample_accession, labels = seq_len(as.character(length(unique(cur_data()$sample_accession))))
    )
  ) %>%
  # Only keep two replicates
  filter(
    rep %in% c("1", "2")
  ) %>%
  ungroup()

X_SCALE <- c(1050, 16400)

sendai_coverage_plot <- ggplot(
  sendai_bam_coverage_long %>%
    mutate(
      score = pmax(score, 1e-8)
    ),
  aes(
    x = pos,
    y = score,
    fill = rep,
    group = sample_accession
  )
) +
  # geom_line() +
  # geom_ribbon(aes(ymax = score), ymin = -Inf, alpha = 0.5, line.width = NA, outline.type = "upper") +
  # geom_step(alpha = 0.6) +
  # geom_line(aes(y = score), alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_ribbon(aes(ymax = score), ymin = -Inf, alpha = 0.6, outline.type = "upper", color = NA) +
  ggh4x::facet_wrap2(~treatment_grouped, ncol = 1, strip.position = "right", axes = "all", remove_labels = "x") +
  geom_text(
    aes(x = X_SCALE[1] + 500, y = 1e2, label = treatment_grouped),
    data = distinct(sendai_bam_coverage_long, treatment_grouped),
    inherit.aes = FALSE,
    hjust = 0, vjust = 1,
    size = 3
  ) +
  guides(
    # color = "none",
    # fill = "none"
  ) +
  paletteer::scale_fill_paletteer_d("colorblindr::OkabeIto") +
  # geom_gene(gene_granges) +
  scale_y_log10(
    labels = scales::label_log(),
    breaks = c(1e-3, 1e2),
    limits = c(1e-3, 1e2),
    expand = c(0, 0),
    oob = scales::squish_infinite
  ) +
  # scale_y_log10() +
  labs(
    y = "CPM", color = "Replicate", fill = "Replicate"
  ) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(
    strip.background = element_blank(),
    strip.text = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(),
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = rel(0.8)),
    # axis.line.x = element_line(size = 1),
    legend.position = "top"
  )

ggplot2::ggsave(
  "plots/sendai_coverage_plot_raw.pdf",
  sendai_coverage_plot,
  width = 5, height = 4
)

sendai_combined <- patchwork::wrap_plots(
  sendai_coverage_plot +
    coord_cartesian(xlim = X_SCALE, expand = FALSE) +
    theme(
      # axis.text.x = element_blank(),
      axis.title.x = element_blank(),
      legend.key.size = unit(8, "pt"),
      legend.title = element_text(size = unit(8, "pt")),
      legend.text = element_text(size = rel(0.8)),
      legend.margin = margin(0, 0, 0, 0)
    ),
  sendai_gene_plot +
    coord_cartesian(clip = "off", xlim = X_SCALE, expand = FALSE) +
    theme(
      panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
      panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
      axis.text.x = element_blank(),
      axis.title.x = element_blank()
    ),
  heights = c(1, 0.15)
)

ggplot2::ggsave(
  "plots/sendai_coverage_tracks1.pdf",
  sendai_combined,
  width = 4, height = 3.5
)

sendai_combined <- tracks(
  sendai_coverage_plot,
  sendai_gene_plot,
  ncol = 1,
  heights = c(1, 0.15)
)

xlim(sendai_combined) <- c(1150, 16000)

withr::with_cairo_pdf(
  "plots/sendai_coverage_tracks.pdf",
  width = 5, height = 4,
  {
    print(sendai_combined)
  }
)
```

```{r}
yamanaka_factors <- c("KLF4", "MYC", "POU5F1", "SOX2")

yamanaka_gtf <- ensembl_gtf[
  ensembl_gtf$gene_name %in% yamanaka_factors &
    replace_na(str_detect(ensembl_gtf$tag, "MANE_Select"), FALSE)
]

yamanaka_gtf_edited <- yamanaka_gtf
yamanaka_gtf_edited$type <- recode(
  yamanaka_gtf_edited$type,
  CDS = "cds",
  five_prime_utr = "utr",
  three_prime_utr = "utr"
)
yamanaka_gtf_edited <- yamanaka_gtf_edited[yamanaka_gtf_edited$type %in% c("cds", "utr", "gap")]
```


```{r}
yamanaka_regions <- reduce(
  split(yamanaka_gtf, yamanaka_gtf$gene_name)
)

yamanaka_bam_tracks <- bind_rows(
  map(
    yamanaka_regions,
    \(x)   LoadTrackFile(
      sendai_plot_data$bam_path,
      region = paste0(seqnames(x), ":", start(x), "-", end(x)),
      format = "bam",
      meta.info = sendai_bam_meta,
      norm.method = "None",
      extend = 1000,
      bin.size = 100,
      # bc.extra.para = "--effectiveGenomeSize 2913022398"
    )
  ),
  .id = "gene_name"
) %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  left_join(
    sendai_plot_data %>%
      select(where(negate(is.list))),
    by = c("sample_accession")
  ) %>%
  mutate(
    score_raw = score,
    score = 1e6 * score / (size_factor * mean(n_mapped))
  )

yamanaka_plots <- imap(
  yamanaka_regions,
  \(region, gene_name) {
    # browser()
    region_str <- paste0(seqnames(region), ":", start(region), "-", end(region))
    gene_plot <- ggplot() +
      geom_alignment(
        yamanaka_gtf_edited[yamanaka_gtf_edited$gene_name == gene_name] %>%
          split(.$gene_name),
        # aes(
        #   y = ypos
        # ),
        # range.geom = "arrow",
        cds.rect.h = 0.05
      )

    bam_coverage_long <- yamanaka_bam_tracks %>%
      filter(
        gene_name == gene_name
      ) %>%
      pivot_longer(c(start, end), names_to = "pos_type", values_to = "pos") %>%
      mutate(
        treatment_grouped = case_when(
          treatment == "Control ESC" ~ paste("Control ESC", str_split_fixed(study_name, " ", 3)[, 1], "et al."),
          TRUE ~ treatment
        )
      ) %>%
      group_by(treatment_grouped) %>%
      mutate(
        rep = factor(
          sample_accession, labels = seq_len(as.character(length(unique(cur_data()$sample_accession))))
        )
      ) %>%
      # Only keep two replicates
      filter(
        rep %in% c("1", "2")
      ) %>%
      ungroup()

    X_SCALE <- c(start(region), end(region))
    X_LEN <- end(region) - start(region)
    X_SCALE <- c(X_SCALE[1] - 0.05 * X_LEN, X_SCALE[2] + 0.05 * X_LEN)

    yamanaka_coverage_plot <- ggplot(
      bam_coverage_long %>%
        mutate(
          score = pmax(score, 1e-8)
        ),
      aes(
        x = pos,
        y = score,
        fill = rep,
        group = sample_accession
      )
    ) +
      # geom_line() +
      # geom_ribbon(aes(ymax = score), ymin = -Inf, alpha = 0.5, line.width = NA, outline.type = "upper") +
      # geom_step(alpha = 0.6) +
      # geom_line(aes(y = score), alpha = 0.5) +
      geom_ribbon(aes(x = pos, ymax = score), ymin = -Inf, alpha = 0.6, outline.type = "upper", color = NA) +
      ggh4x::facet_wrap2(~treatment_grouped, ncol = 1, strip.position = "right", axes = "all", remove_labels = "x") +
      geom_text(
        aes(x = X_SCALE[1] + .02 * X_LEN, y = 1e2, label = treatment_grouped),
        data = distinct(bam_coverage_long, treatment_grouped),
        inherit.aes = FALSE,
        hjust = 0, vjust = 1,
        size = 3
      ) +
      guides(
        # color = "none",
        # fill = "none"
      ) +
      paletteer::scale_fill_paletteer_d("colorblindr::OkabeIto") +
      # geom_gene(gene_granges) +
      scale_y_log10(
        labels = scales::label_log(),
        breaks = c(1e-3, 1e2),
        limits = c(1e-3, 1e2),
        expand = c(0, 0),
        oob = scales::squish_infinite
      ) +
      scale_x_continuous(
        labels = scales::label_number(scale_cut = scales::cut_short_scale(), suffix = "b")
      ) +
      # scale_y_log10() +
      labs(
        y = "CPM", color = "Replicate", fill = "Replicate"
      ) +
      theme_classic() +
      theme(
        strip.background = element_blank(),
        strip.text = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(),
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = rel(0.8)),
        # axis.line.x = element_line(size = 1),
        legend.position = "top"
      )

    combined <- patchwork::wrap_plots(
      yamanaka_coverage_plot +
        coord_cartesian(xlim = X_SCALE, expand = FALSE) +
        theme(
          # axis.text.x = element_blank(),
          axis.title.x = element_blank(),
          legend.key.size = unit(8, "pt"),
          legend.title = element_text(size = unit(8, "pt")),
          legend.text = element_text(size = rel(0.8)),
          legend.margin = margin(0, 0, 0, 0)
        ),
      gene_plot +
        coord_cartesian(clip = "off", xlim = X_SCALE, expand = FALSE) +
        theme(
          panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
          panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
          axis.text.x = element_blank(),
          axis.title.x = element_blank()
        ),
      heights = c(1, 0.06)
    )

    # browser()
    combined
  }
)

iwalk(
  yamanaka_plots,
  \(plot, gene_name) {
    withr::with_cairo_pdf(
      paste0("plots/yamanaka_", gene_name, "_coverage_tracks.pdf"),
      width = 4, height = 4,
      {
        print(plot)
      }
    )
  }
)

withr::with_pdf(
  "test.pdf",
  yamanaka_plots_combined <- gridExtra::grid.arrange(
    grobs = map2(
      yamanaka_plots,
      seq_along(yamanaka_plots),
      \(x, i) {
        # browser()
        x[[1]] <- x[[1]] +
          # guides(
          #   fill = if(i == 1) guide_legend() else "none"
          # ) +
          theme(
            axis.title.y = if(i == 1) element_text() else element_blank(),
            axis.text.y = if(i == 1) element_text() else element_blank()
          )
        x <- x & theme(
          plot.margin = margin(0, 0, 8, 0),
          axis.text.x = element_blank(),
          axis.ticks.x = element_blank()
        )
        patchwork:::as_patch(x)
      }
    ),
    nrow = 1
  )
)

withr::with_cairo_pdf(
  "plots/yamanaka_coverage_tracks.pdf",
  grid::grid.draw(yamanaka_plots_combined),
  width = 8, height = 3
)

```

```{r}

yamanaka_plots <- imap(
  yamanaka_regions,
  \(region, gene_name) {
    # browser()
    region_str <- paste0(seqnames(region), ":", start(region), "-", end(region))
    gene_plot <- ggplot() +
      geom_alignment(
        yamanaka_gtf_edited[yamanaka_gtf_edited$gene_name == gene_name] %>%
          split(.$gene_name),
        # aes(
        #   y = ypos
        # ),
        # range.geom = "arrow",
        cds.rect.h = 0.05
      )

    utr_regions <- yamanaka_gtf_edited %>%
      as_tibble() %>%
      filter(
        gene_name == gene_name,
        type == "utr"
      )

    bam_coverage_long <- yamanaka_bam_tracks %>%
      filter(
        gene_name == gene_name
      ) %>%
      group_by(sample_accession, gene_name) %>%
      mutate(
        score_norm = scales::rescale(score, to = c(0, 1))
      ) %>%
      ungroup() %>%
      pivot_longer(c(start, end), names_to = "pos_type", values_to = "pos") %>%
      mutate(
        treatment_grouped = case_when(
          treatment == "Control ESC" ~ paste("Control ESC", str_split_fixed(study_name, " ", 3)[, 1], "et al."),
          TRUE ~ treatment
        )
      ) %>%
      group_by(treatment_grouped) %>%
      mutate(
        rep = factor(
          sample_accession, labels = seq_len(as.character(length(unique(cur_data()$sample_accession))))
        )
      ) %>%
      # Only keep two replicates
      filter(
        rep %in% c("1", "2")
      ) %>%
      ungroup()

    X_SCALE <- c(start(region), end(region))
    X_LEN <- end(region) - start(region)
    X_SCALE <- c(X_SCALE[1] - 0.05 * X_LEN, X_SCALE[2] + 0.05 * X_LEN)
    Y_SCALE <- c(0, 1)

    yamanaka_coverage_plot <- ggplot(
      bam_coverage_long %>%
        mutate(
          score_norm = pmax(score_norm, 1e-8)

      geom_rect(

      ggh4x::facet_wrap2(~treatment_grouped, ncol = 1, strip.position = "right", axes = "all", remove_labels = "x") +
      geom_text(
        aes(x = X_SCALE[1] + .02 * X_LEN, y = Y_SCALE[2], label = treatment_grouped),
        data = distinct(bam_coverage_long, treatment_grouped),
        inherit.aes = FALSE,
        hjust = 0, vjust = 1,
        size = 3
      ) +
      guides(
        # color = "none",
        # fill = "none"
      ) +
      paletteer::scale_fill_paletteer_d("colorblindr::OkabeIto") +
      # geom_gene(gene_granges) +

      scale_y_continuous(

          legend.key.size = unit(8, "pt"),
```
